name: Energy Flowers #1
description:
A work-in-progress result from a data art project visualizing the high-voltage electrical grid of one entire country in Europe, showing data about energy generation and consumption from different "stations". 

This result came very early in the process where I was exploring different ways in how to best show the seasonal trends across the year while also showing as much of the detail of the underlying data (for which I had 1 measurement, per station, for each hour during a year!)

This specific result feels almost like a coding bug, but it was more due to the large variety in the data per station, combined with a rather rough programming of how to visualize the paths.
